title: CIDR Deaggregate
description: Decompose CIDR blocks and ranges into uniform target prefix subnets

input.networksTooltip: Enter CIDR blocks, IP ranges, or individual IPs - one per line
input.targetPrefixTooltip: Target prefix length for uniform decomposition (e.g., 24 for /24 subnets)

results.title: Deaggregated Subnets
results.titleTooltip: Generated uniform subnets from input networks and ranges

summary.inputTooltip: Original networks, ranges, and addresses provided
summary.noteTooltip: Address count difference due to subnet boundary alignment
summary.expanded: Expanded by {count} addresses (due to alignment to /{prefix} boundaries)
summary.reduced: Reduced by {count} addresses (due to alignment to /{prefix} boundaries)

empty.title: No Subnets Generated
empty.message: The target prefix length may be too large for the input networks, or the input is empty.
